title: Card Data Model
description:
Describes the information for a card.
This model contains the properties of the card that will not change from print to print.

id.title: UUID (v5) for the Card generated by YGOJSON

property.title: Special property for the spell or trap (lower-case)
property.description: These are properties represented by the spell/trap icon

effectText.title: Effect text of the card
effectText.description:
Empty for normal monsters
Note that the list of materials or pendulum effects are not included as they are on their own property

monsterTypes.title: Monster type(s)
monsterTypes.description: This property represent the monster-type line as an array of lower-case values

flavorText.title: Flavor text for normal monsters
flavorText.description: For effect monsters, the flavor text is empty

atk.title: Actual ATK value
atk.description:
The value of the ATK of a monster, where if <tt>0</tt> it can also be undefined.
In that case, the <tt>atkUndefined</tt> property will be equal to <tt>true</tt>

atkUndefined.title: Flag to indicate an undefined (<tt>0</tt>) ATK value

def.title: Actual DEF value
def.description:
The value of the DEF of a monster, where if <tt>0</tt> it can also be undefined.
In that case, the <tt>defUndefined</tt> property will be equal to <tt>true</tt>

defUndefined.title: Flag to indicate an undefined (<tt>0</tt>) DEF value

materials.title: Materials for extra-deck monsters
materials.description: This property contains the materials as defined on the card text

linkRating.title: Link rating of the link monster

linkArrows.title: Link arrows of the link monster

cardText.title: Card Text Definition Model
cardText.description:
Text of the card that can be localized.
This model does not contain localized data for constant values.

effectText.title: Effect text for the card
effectText.description:
Empty for normal monsters
Note that the list of materials or pendulum effects are not included as they are on their own property

flavorText.title: Flavor text for normal monsters
flavorText.description: For effect monsters, the flavor text is empty

materials.title: Materials for extra-deck monsters
materials.description: This property contains the materials as defined on the card text

cardType.title: Card Type Definition Model
cardType.description: Represents the main card types of the Card

identifiers.title: Identifiers Definition Model
identifiers.description: Third-party identifiers (IDs) associated to the Card.

konamiId.title: Konami ID
konamiId.description: Yu-Gi-Oh official database. The ID might not appear on the official database for some languages if it was not released yet on that location. Also, cards might not have an ID if nor released at all.

password.title: Unique 8-digit password
password.description:
Unique 8-digit number printed in the bottom of cards, which is the same in all languages and prints.
Certain cards does not have a password.

passwordAlt.title: Alternative password
passwordAlt.description: Alternative password number for some special cases on different prints. Examples of these are the Dark Magician (Arkana) and the alternative art of Polymerization

yugipediaPageId.title: Yugipedia Page ID
yugipediaPageId.description: Page ID on Yugipedia. This ID can be used on the Yugipedia API as the pageId or pageids parameters

linkArrow.title: Link-Arrow Definition Model
linkArrow.description: Values for the linkArrows on link monsters
